name: download-artifacts-new
description: Download build artifacts with filtering by artifact name, when you have more than one artifact, or download sub folders or files, without downloading the entire artifact folder.
author: Chaminda Chandrasekara

inputs.name: artifactNames
inputs.label: Build Artifact Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifact Names/Paths to Download separated by ;. Example asterisk (default) as artifact names allow all artifacts download. Multiple artifacts can be specified with pattern ArtifactSourceAlias1\Drop1;ArtifactSourceAlias2\Drop2. Artifact name with subpath allows to download sub item of a given artifact. Multiple can be specified with pattern ArtifactSourceAlias1\Drop1\MyWebProj;ArtifactSourceAlias1\Drop1\ReleaseNote.html;ArtifactSourceAlias2\Drop2;ArtifactSourceAlias3\Drop3\MyWebProj2 . Wild cards in paths are NOT SUPPORTED. Asterisk value as default supported to specify all artifacts.

inputs.name: artifactDestinationFolder
inputs.label: Artifacts Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path of the destination folder on the local machine, or a UNC Share like c:\fabrikamfiber or \\\\fabrikamshare\fabrikamfiber. If not supplied default value $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)\$(Build.DefinitionName) will be applied automatically
